pkgmetadata.longdescription: QLink-Interface (1.0.0)=====================================================Welcome to QLink-Interface's README.To install the package do:```bashmake install```To verify the installation do:```make verify```This package defines the service interface of the link layer and provides a magic link layer protocol.For details about this interface and specific header fields see the paper:* A Link Layer Protocol for Quantum Networks https://arxiv.org/abs/1903.09778and the QIRG draft:* The Link Layer service in a Quantum Internet https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-dahlberg-ll-quantum
